mapper.select: SELECT m.member_info_name, a.*, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, a.member_attendance_start, a.member_attendance_end) AS hours_worked, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.member_attendance_start, a.member_attendance_end) % 60 AS minutes_worked FROM erp_member_info m INNER JOIN erp_member_attendance a ON m.member_info_key = a.member_info_key ORDER BY m.member_info_key, a.member_attendance_date

SELECT a.*, m.member_info_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, member_attendance_start, member_attendance_end) AS hours_worked, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, member_attendance_start, member_attendance_end) % 60 AS minutes_worked FROM erp_member_info m INNER JOIN erp_member_attendance a ON m.member_info_key = a.member_info_key WHERE a.member_info_key = #{member_info_key} ORDER BY member_attendance_date;

SELECT a.*, m.member_info_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, member_attendance_start, member_attendance_end) AS hours_worked, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, member_attendance_start, member_attendance_end) % 60 AS minutes_worked FROM erp_member_info m INNER JOIN erp_member_attendance a ON m.member_info_key = a.member_info_key WHERE a.member_info_key = #{member_info_key} AND member_attendance_date = #{member_attendance_date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_member_attendance(member_info_key, member_attendance_date, member_attendance_start) VALUES(#{member_info_key}, NOW(), NOW())
